channel.title: In-Game Highscore Help?
channel.description: Ok, I have everything setup for my hiscores in-game. I have the Scoreboard integrated with the interface but i cant figure out how to add the highscores on it with out me having to update it manually. I am wanting it to show the players with the most PK points on my server and I am using a delta source. Can anyone help me? Rep Will be given to the person who can answer my question.

item.title: In-Game Highscore Help?
item.dc:creator: @DrakePhase DrakePhase
item.description:
@DrakePhase wrote:

Ok, I have everything setup for my hiscores in-game. I have the Scoreboard integrated with the interface but i cant figure out how to add the highscores on it with out me having to update it manually. I am wanting it to show the players with the most PK points on my server and I am using a delta source. Can anyone help me? Rep Will be given to the person who can answer my question.
